# Accelerate Your Content Creation with Koala AI

Create high-quality SEO-optimized articles in minutes. KoalaWriter, powered by
GPT-4, combines SERP analysis with real-time data to create content that
ranks.

Try KoalaWriter for FreeView Pricing →

> “I’ve tried many, and I mean many AI content software platforms. I didn’t
> fully embrace AI content until I tried Koala. Koala is the first platform
> that produced full blog posts from a simple keyword prompt that is good
> enough to publish on my niche sites. The content output is ridiculously in-
> depth and structured with heading tags, plenty of spot-on subheadings that
> make articles almost always publish-ready. My current use is to create
> engaging, helpful content for social media followers.”

Jon Dykstra

Fatstacks

## View sample articles

Below are articles created by KoalaWriter. The only editing involved
formatting and adding images.

### Best Ultrawide Gaming Monitors: Top Picks for 2023

### Do You Really Need a 4K Monitor? The Pros and Cons of Upgrading Your
Display

### How to Choose the Perfect Gift for Your Best Friend: Top Tips and Ideas

## Engineered to create the best content possible

All of our features are designed with SEOs and content creators in mind to
help you create the best, most factual content possible in the least amount of
time. Below is a highlight of just some of our features.

AI-Powered SEO Analysis

    

KoalaWriter automatically analyzes the SERP for your keyword and includes
entities and keywords to help your article rank.

Easy Amazon Affiliate Articles

    

Generate complete, ready-to-publish Amazon affiliate articles in minutes.
Powered by live Amazon data including real reviews and product data.

Instant Wordpress Publishing

    

Publish to Wordpress in one click. Don't use Wordpress? No problem! We offer
webhook integration too for Zapier and custom integrations.

Two-in-one AI Writer and Chatbot

    

With a single subscription you get access to both KoalaWriter and KoalaChat.

SEO-Focused Chatbot

    

KoalaChat is like ChatGPT + real-time data + custom commands specifically
designed for SEOs and content creators.

Superior to ChatGPT

    

Koala's proprietary SEO algorithm, data integration, and dynamic prompting
produces ready-to-publish articles.

On-Brand Voice

    

Choose from 7 writing styles and 4 POVs for a human-like touch. You can also
specify a custom tone of voice for your brand.

Real-Time Data

    

Fetch up-to-date content from the internet with "Real-Time Search Results" to
augment the AI with additional factual data.

Enhanced Control

    

You get full control over the outline: easily add, delete, and re-order H2s
and H3s before generating the article.

Google Sheets Integration

    

You can easily integrate KoalaChat with Google Sheets for a seamless workflow
and custom integrations.

API Access

    

Access Koala's capabilities for complex projects with our API. Write an entire
article with a single API call.

Risk-Free Trial

    

Try Koala for 30 days. Not satisfied? Get a prompt refund.

## Ready to get started?

KoalaWriter is the leading AI writer for SEOs. With just one click, you can
create SEO-friendly articles that are optimized for search engines. The
articles also work great for social media and newsletter content, too!

It also has real-time integrations with Google search results data and Amazon
product data, enabling you to generate both informational and affiliate
content with ease. Plus, our team is continuously improving the platform, and
by purchasing a plan now, you can lock in a fantastic price.

And for the cherry on top, you'll gain access to KoalaChat, a cutting-edge
tool that is even better than ChatGPT. It employs the same language model as
ChatGPT Plus (GPT-3.5 Turbo) and incorporates real-time search result
integrations to ensure that you receive up-to-date information.

## Frequently Asked Questions

Is my payment information safe?

    Yes. All of your payment information is handled by Stripe, a trusted payment processor. We do not store any of your payment information on our servers. When you checkout or manage your plan, you will be redirected to a secure Stripe-hosted page which means we couldn't access any of your sensitive payment information even if we wanted to.

Do you offer refunds?

    Yes. If you aren't satisfied just contact us and we can provide a refund. However, if there is substantial usage of the service we reserve the right to deny the refund request.

Is it easy to cancel my plan?

    Yes. You can cancel your plan at any time by clicking on the 'Open Customer Portal' button on the 'Account' page when you are logged in.

Is there a free trial available?

    Yes. Just start using our services and you will see how much available usage you have left. Currently the free trial is limited to 5,000 words and 25 chat messages.

Does unused usage carry over to the next month?

    No. Unused words, chat messages, API credits, or Google Sheets credits will not carry over to the next month. However, you can upgrade your plan at any time to increase your monthly usage limits.

Do I own the output generated by KoalaChat and KoalaWriter?

    Yes. You retain all rights to the input you provide to our services and we assign you all rights to the AI-generated output. You can read more about this in our Terms of Service.

What payment methods do you accept?

    Currently we accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, Diners Club, JCB, and China UnionPay card payments worldwide. We also accept Apple Pay, Google Pay, US bank transfers, and Canadian bank transfers. We are not able to accept PayPal at this time.

How do I change my plan?

    You can change your plan at any time from this page by buying a new plan. When you buy a new plan it will reset your subscription date and automatically cancel your old subscription. Your leftover credits will rollover. Upgrades are not prorated since you receive the full amount of credits when buying the new plan.

How many API calls and Google Sheet formulas are allowed?

    On all plans, Google Sheets Integration and API Access is counted towards the KoalaChat limit. So for example, on the Professional plan you can use a total of 1,000 KoalaChat messages, API calls, and Google Sheets formulas combined.
